Can be installed to / run from a USB dri.message: Kann installiert werden auf / ausgeführt werden von einem USB-Stick, lokalem Ordner etc.

Fully self-contained in a single directo.message: Vollständig in einem einzigen Verzeichnis enthalten - speichert alle Einstellungen / Spielstände in demselben Verzeichnis.

Installs for all users on a system..message: Installiert für alle Benutzer auf einem System.

Warzone is licensed under the GPLv2+ lic.message: Warzone ist lizenziert unter der GPLv2+ Lizenz (& anderen).

Command the forces of The Project in a b.message: Befehlige die Truppen des Projektes in dem Kampf die Welt wieder aufzubauen, nachdem die Menschheit fast durch Atomraketen vernichtet wurde.

Seize territory and resources, build ext.message: Seize territory and resources, build extensive bases, and expand your production & research.

Compete in massive LAN / online multipla.message: Trete in riesigen LAN / Mehrspielerkämpfen mit bis zu 10 Spielern an.

Play versus AI bots in local skirmishes.message: Play versus AI bots in local skirmishes (or as added teammates / enemies in multiplayer), and practice your skills with endless replayability.

Over 400 different technologies yield an.message: Over 400 different technologies yield an extensive tech tree with many paths to choose.

Customize your units with a flexible des.message: Customize your units with a flexible design system that allows for a wide variety of possible units and tactics.

Supporting Windows, macOS, Linux, FreeBS.message: Supporting Windows, macOS, Linux, FreeBSD and more - all with cross-platform multiplayer support!

Open source, open development, open comm.message: Open source, open development, open community - free as in freedom!

Anyone can file bugs, contribute patches.message: Anyone can file bugs, contribute patches, and request enhancements.

Chat on the forums, make & share add-ons.message: Chat on the forums, make & share add-ons, join online tournaments, and contribute to the Warzone 2100 experience.

People around the world are waiting!.message: People around the world are waiting!

Everything is free, including source cod.message: Everything is free, including source code, downloads, and all features.

Developed in the 90s by Pumpkin Studios..message: Developed in the 90s by Pumpkin Studios.

Warzone 2100 was originally developed by.message: Warzone 2100 was originally developed by Pumpkin Studios and published by Eidos Interactive.

In 1999, it was released commercially fo.message: In 1999, it was released commercially for Microsoft Windows and Sony PlayStation.

Pumpkin Studios ended their support for.message: Pumpkin Studios beendete den Support für Warzone 2100 am 5. Januar 2000.

In 2004, after fan petition, Warzone's s.message: 2004 wurde nach einer Fanpetition der Quellcode von Warzone unter einer Open-Source-Lizenz veröffentlicht.
